description: Observation to record details of a trawl or shot.

shotNumber.description: The number of this shot or trawl on the trip.

duration.description: The length of time of the trawl or shot in the units specified.

durationUnits.description: The units in which the duration is measured. UN/CEFACT units SHOULD be used where these are applicable.

distance.description: The distance and its units of the trawl.

averageSpeed.description: The average speed and its units of the trawl.

catchRate.description: The catch rate during the trawl.

catchRateUnits.description: The units in which the catch rate is expressed.

fishingMethod.description: The fishing method employed in the trawl.

area.description: The code or name of the area being trawled.

meshSize.description: The mesh size of the nets.

bucketCount.description: The number of buckets of catch in the trawl or shot.

bucketWeight.description: The total weight and units of the buckets of catch in the trawl or shot.

catch.description: The quantity of the species and optionally of the grade caught in the trawl.

bycatch.description: The quantity of the bycatch species and optionally of the grade caught in the trawl.

wildlife.description: Details of the wildlife encountered during the trawl.

comments.description: Comments on the trawl or shot.

blocksFished.description: Array of the blocks fished in this trawl or shot.

summaryGeometry.description: The geojson MultiPoint feature (with its geometry) that identifies the start point, end point and optionally the mid point of the trawl or shot.

loggedGeometry.description: The geojsonfeature (with its geometry) that covers the logged track of the trawl in detail.
